name: Helix Perk Cards
short: Modular perk card system for Helix (flexible + customizable).
description: A modular system for Helix that allows you to add, manage, and customize perk cards for your server. Designed for flexibility and easy integration with your existing Helix setup.

name: Arch's Liro Modules
short: Extended utility modules for the Liro framework.
description: A collection of modules for the Liro framework, providing extended functionality, utilities, and integrations for Garry's Mod servers.

name: ArchFramework
short: Extensible framework foundation for rapid GMod dev.
description: A robust and extensible framework for Garry's Mod, built for rapid development and easy customization of server features and game modes.
